statements: SELECT * FROM follow_up_emails;
SELECT email_id, email_subject FROM follow_up_emails WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT email_id, email_subject, send_date FROM follow_up_emails WHERE email_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, email_body FROM follow_up_emails WHERE send_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM follow_up_emails WHERE email_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM follow_up_emails WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT email_subject, send_date FROM follow_up_emails WHERE email_id = 456;
SELECT customer_id, email_body FROM follow_up_emails WHERE send_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT email_id, email_subject FROM follow_up_emails WHERE customer_id = 789 ORDER BY send_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM follow_up_emails WHERE email_subject LIKE '%discount%' AND email_body LIKE '%coupon%' ORDER BY send_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT name, last_activity FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_id, email_opened, email_clicked FROM email_logs WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, email_sent_at FROM email_logs WHERE email_opened = TRUE AND email_clicked = FALSE;
SELECT name, email, last_activity FROM customers WHERE last_activity > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_activity DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, email_sent_at, email_opened FROM email_logs WHERE email_opened = true AND email_clicked = false ORDER BY email_sent_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN email_logs ON customers.customer_id = email_logs.customer_id WHERE customers.name LIKE 'John%' AND email_logs.email_opened = false;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(log_id) AS email_logs_count FROM email_logs GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(log_id) > 5 ORDER BY email_logs_count DESC;

SELECT customers.name, email_logs.email_sent_at FROM customers LEFT JOIN email_logs ON customers.customer_id = email_logs.customer_id WHERE customers.name IS NOT NULL AND email_logs.email_sent_at > '2021-06-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_email, last_interaction_date FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_email, last_interaction_date FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM email_templates WHERE template_name = 'Welcome Email';
SELECT template_name, email_subject FROM email_templates ORDER BY template_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_email FROM customers WHERE last_interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT template_name, email_subject FROM email_templates WHERE template_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT customer_id, action_type FROM customer_actions WHERE action_date >= '2022-10-01' ORDER BY action_date DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_email, COUNT(customer_actions.action_id) AS total_actions FROM customers JOIN customer_actions ON customers.customer_id = customer_actions.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id HAVING total_actions > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT template_name, email_subject FROM email_templates WHERE template_id > 5;
SELECT log_id, recipient_email FROM email_logs ORDER BY sent_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10
SELECT template_name, email_subject FROM email_templates WHERE template_id = 3
SELECT customer_name, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM customers JOIN customer_behavior ON customers.customer_id = customer_behavior.customer_id
SELECT template_name, email_body FROM email_templates ORDER BY template_id ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT template_id, subject FROM email_templates WHERE template_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM email_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, timestamp FROM click_events WHERE url LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 5;
SELECT template_id, subject FROM email_templates;
SELECT customer_id, template_id, timestamp FROM email_logs WHERE template_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM click_events WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
